Name: The True Love Rings
About the game: 'The True Love Rings' is a scene interactive decryption game. The overall atmosphere is casual and relaxed. Players follow the prompts in the scene to gradually solve the puzzles and help solve the problems encountered in life. Game Features Full character animation effect Linear item interaction mechanism Simple puzzle scene solving Pleasant game atmosphere Gameplay Mouse click or drag items to interact and advance the process.
